type: RFP - Tender Notice for Commercial and Industrial Furniture
short_summary: Purchase of office furniture for Transport Canada
description: Transport Canada is seeking a supplier to deliver and install office furniture at an Abbotsford location.
duration_in_months: With a planned start date of March 14, 2024, and a planned end date of March 28, 2024
full_summary:
**EZ899-240933 - Workspaces Furniture Tender for Transport Canada**
==============================================================

### Tender Details

* Tender Title: Workspaces Furniture Tender for Transport Canada
* Reference Number: WS4234082886
* Amendment Number: 0 (No amendments)
* Publication Date: 2023-10-12

### Tender Status

* Tender Status: Expired (Note: Tender submission deadline has passed)
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-01T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: March 14, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Government of Canada (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Bid

### Goods and Services Information

* Goods and Services: Commercial and industrial furniture
* Deliverables: Delivery and installation of office furniture at Transport Canada's location in Abbotsford, BC

### Key Requirements

* Delivery and installation to start on March 14, 2024, and be completed no later than March 28, 2024
* Purchaser is Public Services and Procurement Canada on behalf of Transport Canada

### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Kristina Mikulova (she/her)
* Contact Email: [kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact Organization: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Tender Documents

* Tender documents available on Ariba Discovery platform: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17705109?extsite=MTc3MDUxMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17705109?extsite=MTc3MDUxMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)  [French link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17705109?extsite=MTc3MDUxMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
